comment.author: 89495087@N07
comment._content: From Bill AVES - This is an IWM (Q1473) photo taken in September 1916 at Maricourt on the Somme. The locomotive is one of the Etat Belge engines used by the Railway Operating Division of the Royal Engineers. Quite why it has been derailed is not recorded, but see my book "R.O.D - the Railway Operating Division on the Western Front" published in Jan 2010 (ISBN 978-1-900289- 993) for more details.
